episodes.title: The Cult Within a Cult
episodes.description:
NXIVM was the name of Keith Raniere's infamous multi-level marketing company that operated from 1998 to 2018. It used practices of neuro-linguistic programming or NLP to effectively 'brainwash' new recruits in their corporate cult. As NXIVM grew, Keith established an inner circle known as D.O.S or Dominus Obsequious Sororium. This is the insane story of how NXIVM manipulated thousands of people under the guise of self help.

episodes.title: The Cult of Mormonism
episodes.description:
Mormonism is a modern religion founded by American "Prophet" Joseph Smith in 1830 with the establishment of the Church of Jesus Christ and publication of the infamous Book of Mormon. Now nearly 200 years old, it has spiraled into one of the fastest growing religions in the world. The actual history of Mormonism is one of absurdity, a completely fabricated story designed to fulfill Smith's agenda. Operating like a billion dollar corporation instead of a religion: this is the cult of mormonism.

episodes.title: The Cult of Heaven's Gate
episodes.description:
Heaven's Gate is appropriately referred to as the 'Cult of Cults'. From 1974 to 1997, they lived in solitude only interacting with each other until the day of their transcendence. This video explores the insane origin story, impact, and aftermath of the 39 disciples of Marshall Applewhite and Bonnie Nettles.

episodes.title: The Manson Family
episodes.description:
Charles Manson formed a murderous cult that ravaged Hollywood throughout the 1960's. Whether it be hiding out at Spahn's Ranch, or spreading 'Helter Skelter' ideology, the Manson Family is infamous for their crimes. These include the LaBianca and Sharon Tate murders.

episodes.title: The Cult of Jared Leto
episodes.description:
Jared Leto is a known for being both a Hollywood A-list actor, and frontman for Thirty Seconds to Mars. During his long and successful career as a celebrity, dark rumors and allegations have come out against him. Jared Leto is currently in the zeitgeist for his roles in House of Gucci, Morbius, and WeCrashed. Here is how Jared Leto has built a cult-like fandom that makes him untouchable in the media. 

Welcome to the Dystopia. 

Editing/Production/Visuals/Sound Design/Story : Philion
